name: Viltnemda
description:
You are viltnemda.

A retro PSX style era horror game

You've been called into the forest to investigate a wounded deer, but the forest is dark and all you have is a flashlight. Oh bother, what a Tuesday you're having.
---
Viltnemda is a horror walking-sim experience with a retro artstyle

With your trusty flashlight, you must traverse through the dark forest to find the wounded deer and uncover the secrets of the forest.

  • Flashlight mechanics that turns the flashlight on AND off!
  • Possibly a deer
  • So spooky the programmer won't even play it
  • A lot of trees
  • like, a lot of trees
  • Atmospheric audiodesign that resembles an actual forest

Viltnemda was developed over the course of 5 days for Brackeys Game jam 2022
Was also entered to participate in Norwegian Game Awards 2022.

This game would not be released on Steam without the help of Skeive Spillutviklere
